{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Wavlink |model=WL-WN527 |revision=A2 |series=AC1200 |asin=B00NVSOS9W;GB; |newegg=9SIV0JT6BH8909 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |type=wireless router, access point |est_release_date=08/09/2016 |fcc_id=NZ3WS-WN527 |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Realtek |cpu1_model=RTL8197DN |cpu1_cspeed=660 |fla1=16 |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Nanya |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=2 |serial=yes |wi1_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip1_model=RTL8812AR |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi2_chip1_model=RTL8192ER |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Realtek |sw_model=RTL8367RB |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=1 |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=Wavlink-2.4G, Wavlink-AC, |default_ip=192.168.10.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=80:3F:5D |oui_eth=80:3F:5D }} {{TagLine|AC1200 Dual Band Wireless Router}} :{{ProductPage|https://www.wavlink.com/en_us/product/WN527A2.html}}
No FCC ID is printed on the label visible in Amazon customer images.
*[https://www.neweggbusiness.com/product/product.aspx?item=9SIV0JT6BH8909 ''Wavlink WL-WN527A2'' on '''Newegg Business'''] *[https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=46606&p=9 ''Realtek SoC support'' on '''OpenWrt''' forums] :(RTL8197DN + RTL8192ER + RTL8812AR + RTL8367RB)
===Models=== :;[https://www.wavlink.com/en_us/category/routers.html Wireless Routers] (QUANTUM) *[[Wavlink WL-WN533A8]] (T8) - AC3000 MU-MIMO Tri-band Smart Wi-Fi Router *[[Wavlink WL-WN531A6]] (D6) - AC2100 MU-MIMO Dual-band Smart Wi-Fi Router *[[Wavlink WL-WN531Q6]] (D6Q) - AC2100 MU-MIMO Dual-band Smart Wi-Fi Router *[[Wavlink WL-WN531A3]] (D4) - AC1200 Dual-band Smart Wi-Fi Router with Touchlink *[[Wavlink WL-WN531P3]] (D4) - AC1200 Dual-band Smart Wi-Fi Router with Touchlink *[[Wavlink WL-WN531G3]] (D4G) - AC1200 Dual-band Smart Wi-Fi Router with Giga LAN *[[Wavlink WL-WN530HA3]] (D4H) - AC1200 High Power Dual-band Smart Wi-Fi Router *[[Wavlink WL-WN530HB3]] (D4C) - AC1200 High Power Dual-band Wi-Fi Router *[[Wavlink WL-WN530HG4]] (AC1200) - AC1200 High Power Dual-band Gigabit Router *[[Wavlink WL-WN530H4]] (AC1200) - AC1200 High Power Dual Band Wireless Router *[[Wavlink WL-WN532A3]] (AC1200) - AC1200 Dual Band Smart Wi-Fi Router *[[Wavlink WL-WN527G4]] (ARK D4) - AC1300 Wireless Dual-band Gigabit Router
